trans-unit.source: Defines access control to assemblies and types for purposes of XAML loading.
Static methods of XamlAccessLevel return instances of XamlAccessLevel, based on input.
This is the only way to generate a XamlAccessLevel value (the constructor is private).
XamlAccessLevel is generally only used in conjunction with <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>.
Returns a <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> instance based on an assembly requested by <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>.
The assembly for the request.
A instance, with the assembly value used as source information for <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel.AssemblyAccessToAssemblyName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
assembly is .
Returns a <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> instance based on an assembly requested by <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName>.
The assembly name for the request.
A instance, with the assemblyName value used as source information for <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel.AssemblyAccessToAssemblyName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
assemblyName is .
assemblyName is not a valid fully qualified assembly name.
Gets the <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName> of the assembly for which this <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> determines permissions.
The <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName> of the assembly for which this <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> determines permissions.
Returns a <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> instance based on a specific type specified by its qualified name.
A string that is parsed as an assembly-qualified type name.

A instance, with the assemblyQualifiedTypeName value used as source information for <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel.PrivateAccessToTypeName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel.AssemblyAccessToAssemblyName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> determined by reflection on the type.
assemblyQualifiedTypeName is .
assemblyQualifiedTypeName is not a valid assembly-qualified type name.
-or- Assembly name within assemblyQualifiedTypeName is not a valid assembly name.
Returns a <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> instance based on a specific type specified by <xref:System.Type>.
The <xref:System.Type> to request access for.

A instance, with the type value used as source information for <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel.PrivateAccessToTypeName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel.AssemblyAccessToAssemblyName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> determined by reflection on the type.
type is .
Gets the unqualified string name of the type for which this <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> determines permissions.
The unqualified string name of the type for which this <xref href="System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel"></xref> determines permissions.
